verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Press on, press on toward the goal, The wondrous, peerless Christ. To gain the prize of God’s high call, Press on, press on to Christ!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Pressing on! Pressing on! Pressing on! Hallelujah, for the prize We’re pressing on! On and on! To gain the Christ of God!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Press on, press on, count all things loss, All that was gain to us. To win the prize, the Christ of God, Is far more glorious!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Press on, press on to know the Lord And resurrection power. Oh, this is our supreme reward — His newness every hour!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
